data.name: Access Account
data.description: Our Access account is your complete everyday transaction account.

features.additionalInfo: Make unlimited fee-free bill payments using BPAY via Internet Banking or from our app.
Make fee-free Pay anyone or BPAY transactions via Internet Banking or from our app.
Receive additional fee-free Visa Debit cards to make purchases or cash-out transactions within Australia.

features.additionalValue: The Visa Debit card can be added to Apple Pay.

features.additionalInfo: Receive a fee-free Visa Debit card to make purchases or cash-out transactions within Australia and worldwide.
Make unlimited fee-free transactions using the Visa Debit card, or via Internet Banking or Mobile Banking.
The Access Account can be linked in an offset arrangement with eligible home and investment loan held with us.

eligibility.additionalInfo: To open an account, you must be an existing customer with a valid email address and an Australian mobile number.

eligibility.additionalValue: To open an account, you must be solely a tax resident of Australia.

eligibility.additionalInfo: To open an account, you must be 14 years or older.

fees.name: Visa Debit card - replacement (express post)
fees.additionalInfo: Visa Debit card replacement (express post). Replacement by regular post is fee-free.

fees.name: Special answer (cheque deposits)
fees.additionalInfo: Special answer fee for cheque deposits.

fees.name: Voucher retrieval
fees.additionalValue: Voucher retrieval fee. Minimum $20.00 ($60 per hour).
fees.additionalInfo: Fee charged for voucher/information retrieval by us.

fees.name: Overdrawn account
fees.additionalInfo: Fee charged on overdrawn accounts (per occurrence).

fees.name: Dishonour fee
fees.additionalInfo: Dishonour fee charged on Pay anyone, BPAY, cheque and Direct Debit dishonours.

fees.name: Stop cheque fee
fees.additionalInfo: Stop cheque requests - lost or stolen. Fee is per cheque.

fees.name: Electronic transfer - Branch assisted
fees.additionalInfo: Fee charged when one-off Pay anyone, BPAY, or transfers are made on behalf of customers by us.

fees.name: Periodical payment - Branch assisted
fees.additionalInfo: Fee charged when periodical Pay anyone or BPAY payments are made on behalf of customers by us. Fee charged per transaction.

fees.name: Statement reissue
fees.additionalInfo: Fee charged when statement is reissued on behalf of customers by us. Fee charged per statement reissue.

fees.name: Deposit book
fees.additionalInfo: Fee charged when a customer orders or reorders a deposit book.
